sentences: Ma olen tegelenud selle projektiga kaks kuud.
Kes on praegu tegelenud selle asjadega?
context: The word 'tegelenud' is the past participle form of the verb 'tegelda', which means to occupy oneself with, engage in, deal with, or work on something. It indicates that someone has been busy doing a particular activity or handling certain matters. The word is commonly used when describing what someone has been occupied with recently.
